title: Configuration
description: Describes the global configuration for the application

items.description: List of semesters for which data and configurations are available

is_current.description: Indicates if this is the current semester (true) or not (false/non-existant)

name_en.description: English name of the semester. Only use if the semester has a name in both French and English

name_fr.description: French name of the semester. Only use if the semester has a name in both French and English

name_en.description: English name of the school. Only use if the school has a name in both French and English

name_fr.description: French name of the school. Only use if the school has a name in both French and English

bus.description: Details about the bus system which the city the school is in uses

name_en.description: English name of the bus company. Only use if the company has a name in both French and English

name_fr.description: French name of the bus company. Only use if the company has a name in both French and English

link.description: Link to the website of the bus company

link_en.description: Link to the English website of the bus company. Only use if the company has different French and English websites

link_fr.description: Link to the French website of the bus company. Only use if the company has different French and English websites
